title: Harvest Deep
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B07JD3F4VXA fast-paced, terrifying action-adventure of subterranean horror—a group of friends fight to survive their captors and the secret nesting deep within an old family mine. Hidden in the West Desert of Utah, the former gold rush settlement of Mammoth is now a ghost town.For Liz Chilton, a photojournalist on assignment, it’s where her deceased mother was raised—but unknown to her—barely escaped with her life 40 years ago.Seeking to reconnect with her mother’s mysterious past, Liz begins a road trip to the area that quickly takes a chilling turn at an RV park when they discover a body, partially consumed—devolving into a horrifying fight for survival.Confronted by the strange family she never knew and the mine’s dark purpose, Liz and her friends must escape or fall prey to the infestation spreading underground.Inspired by true events, HARVEST DEEP is a debut novel of horror by Trent Pettry.
author: Trent Pettry
